SECTION_CONTENT:
Handling
Wear personal protective equipment. Ensure adequate ventilation. Avoid contact with skin,
eyes and clothing. Avoid ingestion and inhalation.
Storage
Keep containers tightly closed in a dry, cool and well-ventilated place. Keep away from
direct sunlight.
